subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Tina Thompson scored 14 points to help the United States defeat Canada, 85-37, yesterday and secure the top seed in Group B at the FIBA Americas women’s tournament in Valdivia, Chile. The Americans will play the second-place finisher in Group A in the semifinals tonight.
